title.rendered: “We the People vs. Corporate Rule:  It’s up to Us” — May 2023 TV program and article about constitutional amendment

content.rendered:
The May 2023 episode of “Glen’s Parallax Perspectives” TV series makes a solid case for amending the U.S. Constitution in a way that would greatly strengthen democracy and promote fairness and progress for the wide range of issues people care about.

For a long time the Supreme Court has given business corporations constitutional rights that our nation’s founders intended only for human beings – and the Supreme Court has allowed Big Money to corrupt our elections.

Glen interviewed two well informed guests who are savvy organizers working with the organization Move to Amend.  They explain how we got into this horrible problem – and how we can get out of it by passing the “We the People” amendment (HJR 54 in the 2023 Congress) to the U.S. Constitution.

This TV interview provides much more information, insights and encouragement that will add  to what some people already know about these issues and will be a really inspiring eye-opener for people who are relatively new to these issues.

Anyone anywhere can watch this May 2023 program through this blog:
WATCH THE VIDEO HERE

Also, people in Thurston County WA who have cable TV can watch it on channel 22 three times a week throughout May 2023: every Monday at 1:30 pm; every Wednesday at 5:00 pm; and every Thursday at 9:00 pm

Glen typed up a very thorough summary of what we said during the interview — and included some additional information.  Besides watching the interview video, I hope you will also read the thorough summary through the next link:

2023.05 We the People vs. Corporate Rule — SUMMARY AND MORE INFORMATION

Please tell your friends about this powerfully informative TV program.  Share this blog link to the video and thorough summary I’ve linked above.

Questions?  Contact Glen Anderson (producer and host) at (360) 491-9093 or glen@parallaxperspectives.org   (Note this new e-mail address.)
